analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: sdig pa ni shogs te gnos shig /

analyzed: ces chos ston to // ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis lan gnyis /

analyzed: btsun pa / mu stegs can de rnams bcom ldan 'das mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la spyan 'dren na /

analyzed: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan du gsol /

original: rgyal po chen po /
analyzed: rgyal po chen po /

analyzed: lnga gang zhe na /

analyzed: mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad 'dul ba'o //

analyzed: zhag bdun lon nas 'gyur bar mkhyen nas /

analyzed: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: He said to King Prasenajit of Kosala,

original: bcom ldan 'das dus ji tsam na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dus ji tsam na /

analyzed: rgyal po chen po; zhag bdun na'o //

analyzed: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ste /
translated: departed from the Blessed One’s presence,

analyzed: mu stegs can rnams la smras pa / kye bcom ldan 'das ni /

analyzed: zhag bdun na rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par mdzad kyi /

analyzed: khyed cag gis bya zhing bshams dgos pa ci yod pa de gyis shig /
translated: Do whatever you need to do and prepare.”

analyzed: shes ldan dag /

analyzed: kye khyed kyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la bos pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so //

original: 'thad pa lags so //
analyzed: 'thad pa lags so //

original: 'di la gtan tshigs ci yod /
analyzed: 'di la gtan tshigs ci yod /

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: “Sirs,

translated: when the ascetic Gautama had not yet appeared in the world,

analyzed: de na kho bo phyogs gcig na 'dug pa la ma dros pa na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis chu bcus shing @64a *//
translated: While I was staying there in one place, the gods who lived in the great lake Anotatta filled my bowl with water🔽and

original: sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: sbyin par byed do //

analyzed: gang gi tshe dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe /

translated: He brought a rag from a charnel ground to the great lake Anavatapta, and the gods who lived in Anavatapta washed and offered it to him.

analyzed: de rnams phan tshun du kye 'di yang de'i phyogs shig yin pas /

analyzed: bdag cag gzhan tshol du dong ngo zhes smras nas /

original: de rnams kyis de la g-yo'i kun tu spyod pas /🔽bkur sti bya ba ltar byas te dong nas /
analyzed: de rnams kyis de la g-yo'i kun tu spyod pas / bkur sti bya ba ltar byas te dong nas /

analyzed: sa phyogs dben pa gzhan zhig tu 'dus nas bgros pa /

analyzed: kye bdag cag gis grogs gzhan ji ltar btsal bar bya /

analyzed: smros shig / de las kha cig gis smras pa /

analyzed: grong khyer skyed mos tshal gyi nags zhes bya ba na /
translated: “In the city, in the forest of the pleasure grove,

analyzed: lnga mngon par shes pa che ge mo zhig gnas pas de'i gan du dong dang / des bdag cag gi grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: there is a certain one with the five superknowledges. Let’s go to him. He will be our friend.”

original: kha cig gis smras pa /
analyzed: kha cig gis smras pa /
translated: Some said,

original: des mi nus kyi /
analyzed: des mi nus kyi /

analyzed: 'on kyang dka' thub kyi nags tshal che ge mo zhes bya ba na /

analyzed: dka' thub can lnga mngon par shes pa che ge mo zhes bya ba gnas pa de'i drung du dong na /
translated: there is a certain one with the five superknowledges. Let’s go to him.

analyzed: des bdag @64b cag gi grogs byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be our friend.”

analyzed: de'i tshe gangs ri'i sul shing sna tshogs kyi nags tshal gyis brgyan pa /
translated: At that time, in the snowy mountains, adorned with various forests,

analyzed: drang srong lnga brgya tsam zhig gnas te phal cher mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'o //

analyzed: de'i nang nas drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gcig grong khyer gyi nye 'khor du 'ongs nas /
translated: Among them, a sage possessing the five superknowledges came to the outskirts of the city.

original: de phan tshun 'phyan pa las /
analyzed: de phan tshun 'phyan pa las /
translated: Wandering around,

analyzed: de rnams kyi drung du 'ongs pa dang / de rnams kyis de la byon pa legs so //

analyzed: zhes bya ba kun tu spyad nas /

analyzed: khyod gang na 'dir 'ongs zhes dris pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do //

analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /

analyzed: da ni khyed kyi res la bab kyi khyed kyis ston cig /

original: ces byas pa dang / de dag spobs pa med pas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /
analyzed: ces byas pa dang / de dag spobs pa med pas cang mi zer bar 'dug go /

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du bya @70a *//
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par 'du bya @70a *//
translated: Then the Blessed One, with a purposeful act,

original: ba dang bcas par zhabs g-yas pa dri gtsang khang gi nang du bsnun pa dang / sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur nas /
analyzed: ba dang bcas par zhabs g-yas pa dri gtsang khang gi nang du bsnun pa dang / sa rnam pa drug tu g-yos par gyur nas /
translated: placed his right foot in the fragrant chamber, and the earth shook in six ways.

original: sa chen po 'di g-yos /
analyzed: sa chen po 'di g-yos /
translated: This great earth shook,

original: kun tu g-yos /🔽kun tu rab tu g-yos /🔽'gul / kun tu 'gul /
analyzed: kun tu g-yos / kun tu rab tu g-yos / 'gul / kun tu 'gul /
translated: trembled,🔽and quaked.🔽It quivered, quaked,

original: kun tu rab tu 'gul bar gyur te /🔽shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
analyzed: kun tu rab tu 'gul bar gyur te / shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
translated: and trembled.🔽When the east rose, the west sank.

original: nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/🔽byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
analyzed: nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/
translated: When the west rose, the east sank.🔽When the north rose, the south sank.

original: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/
analyzed: lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/
translated: When the south rose, the north sank.

original: dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/
analyzed: dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/
translated: When the center rose, the periphery sank.

original: mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to //
analyzed: mtha' mtho na dbus dma' bar gyur to //
translated: When the periphery rose, the center sank.

original: sa g-yos pa des gangs re'i khrod kyi kun dga' ra ba na gnas pa'i drang song rnams la bskul bas /
analyzed: sa g-yos pa des gangs re'i khrod kyi kun dga' ra ba na gnas pa'i drang song rnams la bskul bas /
translated: That earthquake stirred the sages who lived in the pleasure groves of the snowy mountains.

original: de dag phan tshun du /
analyzed: de dag phan tshun du /
translated: They said to each other,

original: shes ldan dag /
analyzed: shes ldan dag /
translated: “Sirs,

original: bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag gis mtshan ma dag bstan gyi /
analyzed: bdag cag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag gis mtshan ma dag bstan gyi /
translated: “We must go to where our fellow practitioners have given us signs.”

original: 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 'dul ba la gzigs te /🔽nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od /
analyzed: 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de dag dong ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 'dul ba la gzigs te / nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od /
translated: When they had spoken, the Blessed One saw that they were ready to be tamed.🔽He emitted light rays the color of gold,

original: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer dag ba kye bas /
analyzed: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer dag ba kye bas /
translated: which were brighter than a thousand suns.

original: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas drang srong de rnams kyi bar thag ji srid pa de /
analyzed: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas drang srong de rnams kyi bar thag ji srid pa de /
translated: The light rays extended from the Blessed One to the ṛṣis,

original: gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: gser zhun ma lta bur snang bar gyur to //
translated: and they appeared like molten gold.

original: drang srong de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang po shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes pa /
analyzed: drang srong de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma dang po shar ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes pa /
translated: The ṛṣis saw the Blessed Buddha, who was as beautiful as the orb of the rising sun,

original: gser mchog sbyangs pa'i dum bu'i tshogs spungs pa lta bu /
analyzed: gser mchog sbyangs pa'i dum bu'i tshogs spungs pa lta bu /
translated: like a heap of the finest refined gold,

original: me tog ku man da ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang gi phung po lta bu'i mdangs can /
analyzed: me tog ku man da ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang gi phung po lta bu'i mdangs can /
translated: and as radiant as a heap of kumuda and utpala flowers.

original: @70b gsung dbyangs sprin chu dang bcas pa dang / rgya mtsho dang / khyu mchog dang / rnga sgra lta bur zab cing brtan pa rnam par gsal ba /
analyzed: @70b gsung dbyangs sprin chu dang bcas pa dang / rgya mtsho dang / khyu mchog dang / rnga sgra lta bur zab cing brtan pa rnam par gsal ba /
translated: His voice is like a cloud, a rain, an ocean, a bull, and a drum. It is deep, firm, and clear.

original: mnyan na bde zhing snyan pa /
analyzed: mnyan na bde zhing snyan pa /
translated: It is pleasant to listen to and is melodious.

original: dpral pa'i phyogs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / padma'i rtsa lag dang / dang pa dang / me tog kun da dang / shel spungs pa lta bur dkar ba'i mdzod spus rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: dpral pa'i phyogs 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / padma'i rtsa lag dang / dang pa dang / me tog kun da dang / shel spungs pa lta bur dkar ba'i mdzod spus rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: His forehead is adorned with a white hair whorl like the foam of a milk ocean, a pearl necklace, a lotus stalk, a jasmine flower, a kunda flower, and a crystal mound.

original: yon tan rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: yon tan rmad du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: He has inconceivable, marvelous qualities.

original: grangs med pa'i tshogs kyis gnas pa /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i tshogs kyis gnas pa /
translated: He is endowed with an inconceivable accumulation.

original: srid pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / bkur sti la mngon par dga' ba'i chags pa'i dri ma'i 'dam gyi skyon dang bral ba /
analyzed: srid pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / bkur sti la mngon par dga' ba'i chags pa'i dri ma'i 'dam gyi skyon dang bral ba /

original: dus dpag tu med pa nas tshogs bsags pa'i ye shes bla na med pa phul du phyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i grags pa can /
analyzed: dus dpag tu med pa nas tshogs bsags pa'i ye shes bla na med pa phul du phyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i grags pa can /
translated: He is famous for being adorned with the ornament of the unsurpassed, perfect wisdom that accumulates the accumulations for immeasurable time.

original: lha'i dbang po'i cod pan rin po che'i myu gus zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa /
analyzed: lha'i dbang po'i cod pan rin po che'i myu gus zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa /
translated: The sprout of the crest jewel of the lord of gods touched his two feet.

original: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / drang srong mchod 'os rnams kyis rjed pa /
analyzed: lha dang / lha ma yin dang / mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / rig sngags 'chang dang / drang srong mchod 'os rnams kyis rjed pa /
translated: He was worshipped by gods, demigods, humans, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, mantra-holders, and worthy sages.

original: mdor na sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa /
analyzed: mdor na sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa /
translated: In short, his body was well adorned with the thirty-two marks of a great being.🔽It was ornamented with the eighty minor marks.

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras pa /🔽'od 'dom gang bas brgyan pa /
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras pa / 'od 'dom gang bas brgyan pa /
translated: It was adorned with a fathom-wide halo.🔽Its light surpassed a thousand suns.

original: 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
analyzed: 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa /
translated: It was completely beautiful like a moving jeweled mountain.🔽Just as sentient beings with the cause of accumulated roots of virtue first see the Buddha,🔽after twelve years of familiarizing the mind with śamatha,🔽or like a sonless man🔽finding a son,🔽or like a poor man seeing a treasure,🔽or like a sick person🔽recovering from illness,🔽or like a traveler

original: rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
analyzed: rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bu kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo //
translated: returning home,🔽or like a soldier🔽victorious in battle,🔽or like a merchant🔽finding great profit,🔽or like a farmer🔽with a bountiful harvest,🔽or like a king🔽ruling over the four continents,🔽or like the sun

original: ji ltar sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar /
analyzed: ji ltar sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyis dang po sangs rgyas mthong ba ltar /
translated: illuminating the world,🔽or like the moon🔽rising in the sky,🔽or like a cakravartin

original: lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms pa'am /
analyzed: lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms pa'am /
translated: with his seven precious possessions,🔽or like a great brahman🔽with his five superknowledges,🔽or like a great nāga🔽with his eight liberations,🔽or like a great garuḍa🔽with his fourfold unobstructed knowledge,🔽or like a great elephant🔽with his six higher knowledges,🔽or like a great lion🔽roaring with the four fearlessnesses,🔽or like a great nāga

original: bu med pas @71a *//
analyzed: bu med pas @71a *//
translated: with his four forms of immeasurables,🔽or like a great cloud🔽with his four forms of correct knowledge,

original: bu rnyed pa'am /
analyzed: bu rnyed pa'am /
translated: or like a great rain🔽with his four forms of fearlessness,🔽or like a great cloud🔽with his four forms of correct knowledge,🔽or like a great rain🔽with his four forms of fearlessness,🔽or like a great cloud🔽with his four forms of correct knowledge,🔽or like a great rain🔽with his four forms of fearlessness,

original: bkren pas gter mthong ba'am /
analyzed: bkren pas gter mthong ba'am /
translated: or like a great cloud🔽with his four forms of correct knowledge,🔽or like a great rain🔽with his four forms of fearlessness,🔽or like a great cloud🔽with his four forms of correct knowledge,🔽or like a great rain🔽with his four forms of fearlessness,

original: rgyal po mngon par 'dod pa dang po rgyal por dbang bskur ba ni /
analyzed: rgyal po mngon par 'dod pa dang po rgyal por dbang bskur ba ni /
translated: The first thing the king desires is the anointment as king.

original: de lta ma yin pas drang srong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
analyzed: de lta ma yin pas drang srong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas /
translated: Since that was not the case, those sages bowed their heads to the feet of the Blessed One

original: phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang / de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang / de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
translated: and sat to one side.🔽The Blessed One knew their thoughts, propensities, disposition, and nature, and taught them the Dharma that was appropriate and that caused them to penetrate the four noble truths.

original: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas /
translated: Having heard it, they destroyed with the thunderbolt of wisdom the twenty high peaks of the mountain of views concerning the transitory collection,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
translated: and manifested the resultant state of stream entry right where they sat.

original: de rnams bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te /
analyzed: de rnams bden pa mthong nas stan las langs te /
translated: Having seen the truths, they rose from their seats,

original: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
translated: approached the Blessed One, pressed their palms together,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and said to the Blessed One,🔽“Blessed One, we wish to go forth in the Dharma and Vinaya that are well explained.

original: btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob na /
analyzed: btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob na /
translated: “Lord, if we are allowed to go forth in the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya, and receive full ordination,

original: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'tshal lo //
translated: we will practice the holy life in the Blessed One’s presence.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rab tu phyung /🔽bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams rab tu phyung / bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de /
translated: The Blessed One allowed their going forth,🔽and they received full ordination.

original: gdams ngag phog pa dang / de rnams kyis 'bad /
analyzed: gdams ngag phog pa dang / de rnams kyis 'bad /
translated: They were given instructions, and they exerted themselves,

original: brtsal / bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g-yo ba dang / mi g-yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas /
analyzed: brtsal / bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g-yo ba dang / mi g-yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas /
translated: and through diligence, effort, and exertion, they understood this five-part wheel of the Dharma, which turns whether the Tathāgata remains or passes into nirvāṇa:🔽that all conditioned things are impermanent,🔽that all conditioned things are suffering,🔽that all phenomena are empty,🔽that all phenomena are without self,🔽and that nirvāṇa is peace.

original: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 'jig pa @71b dang / ltung pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'joms pa'i chos can du rtogs te /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad 'jig pa @71b dang / ltung pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'joms pa'i chos can du rtogs te /
translated: They realized that all conditioned things are subject to destruction, fall, impermanence, and cessation,

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te /
translated: and they abandoned all afflictive emotions, actualized the resultant state of an arhat,

original: dgra bcom pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba /
translated: and became arhats free from attachment to the three realms,

original: sems bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
analyzed: sems bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
translated: He was equal-minded toward a clod of earth and gold.

original: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba /
translated: He was like space and the palm of his hand.

original: tsandan dang ste'ur mtshungs pa /
analyzed: tsandan dang ste'ur mtshungs pa /
translated: He was the same toward a cakravartin and a person of the lowest caste.

original: rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
analyzed: rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa /
translated: He had destroyed the eggshell of ignorance with the vajra of wisdom.

original: mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
translated: He had attained the superknowledges and the discriminations.

original: srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bsnyen bkur la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
analyzed: srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang / bsnyen bkur la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
translated: He was free from attachment to existence, gain, and honor.

original: dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rjed par bya ba dang / gus par bya bar gyur to //
analyzed: dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang / rjed par bya ba dang / gus par bya bar gyur to //
translated: He was worshipped, revered, and honored by the gods, including Indra and Upendra.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs cig zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas /
translated: Then the Blessed One, surrounded by five hundred arhats in a half-moon shape,

original: cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
analyzed: cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
translated: went to the Mahāprātihārya Shrine.

original: 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
analyzed: 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so //
translated: He sat on a lion throne in the midst of a retinue of many hundreds.

original: de nas dge bsnyen ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
analyzed: de nas dge bsnyen ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
translated: Then the laywoman Ṛṣi­jñāna went to where the Blessed One was.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: She bowed her head at the Blessed One’s feet

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: and said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das thugs khral chung ngur mdzad du gsol /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thugs khral chung ngur mdzad du gsol /
translated: “Blessed One, please do not worry.

original: bdag gis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing /
analyzed: bdag gis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing /
translated: I will display a miracle of superhuman power, a higher mundane quality, together with the tīrthikas.

original: mu stegs can rnams thag stsal par bgyi /🔽lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi /
analyzed: mu stegs can rnams thag stsal par bgyi / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi /
translated: I will defeat the tīrthikas.🔽I will delight the gods and humans.

original: skye @72a *// bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi lags so //
analyzed: skye @72a *// bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi lags so //
translated: I will please the holy beings.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma khyod sems khral chung ngur gyis shig /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma khyod sems khral chung ngur gyis shig /
translated: “Ṛṣi­jñāna, do not worry.

original: khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing mu stegs can rnams thag gzhug pa dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang / skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar nus mod kyi /
analyzed: khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing mu stegs can rnams thag gzhug pa dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang / skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar nus mod kyi /
translated: You are able to display the superhuman magical power of a higher being together with the tīrthikas, to defeat the tīrthikas, to delight the gods and humans, and to please the holy beings.

original: 'on kyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la mi 'bod kyi /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di rnams khyod mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la mi 'bod kyi /
translated: However, they do not call you to display the superhuman magical power of a higher being.

original: 'di rnams nga mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la 'bod pas /
analyzed: 'di rnams nga mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul la 'bod pas /
translated: They call me to display the superhuman magical power of a higher being.

original: nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, I myself will display the superhuman magical power of a higher being to them.

original: gal te khyod kyis 'di rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan nas /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis 'di rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan nas /
translated: If you display the superhuman magical power of a higher being together with them,

original: mu stegs can rnams dge sbyong go'u ta ma la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi /
analyzed: mu stegs can rnams dge sbyong go'u ta ma la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi /
translated: the tīrthikas will say, ‘The ascetic Gautama has no superhuman magical power of a higher being.

original: 'on kyang 'di'i nyin thos ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'di'i nyin thos ma rdzu 'phrul len gyi ma /
translated: But today, you will not be able to perform miracles.

original: zhes smra bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: zhes smra bar 'gyur bas /
translated: You will not be able to do that.”

original: khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig /
analyzed: khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig /

analyzed: ces bka' stsal pa dang / de rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug ste /

analyzed: khyim bdag ngan legs sbyin dang / dge tshul skul byed dang / dge tshul ma brjed med dang / dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang / gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa phal mo @72b che dag kyang de dang 'dra'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
translated: The householder Anāthapiṇḍada, the novice Cunda, the novice nun Atimātra, the nun Utpalavarṇā, and most of the others who had miraculous powers were also like that.🔽Then the venerable Mahā­maudgalyāyana went to the Blessed One.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das thugs khral chung ngur mdzad du gsol /

analyzed: bdag gis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bgyi zhing /

analyzed: mu stegs can rnams thag stsal bar bgyi /
translated: and I will defeat the tīrthikas.

original: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi /
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi /

original: skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi lags so //
analyzed: skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi lags so //
translated: and I will please the holy people.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod sems khral chung ngur gyis shig /
analyzed: mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod sems khral chung ngur gyis shig /

analyzed: khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan cing /

analyzed: mu stegs can rnams thag gzhug pa dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bya ba dang / skye bo dam pa rnams snying rangs par bya bar nus mod kyi /

translated: “But these are not called the miracles of higher knowledge of human abilities.🔽I have been challenged by these to a miracle contest of higher knowledge of human abilities.

original: nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: nga nyid kyis 'di dag la mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan par bya'o //
translated: I will show them a miracle contest of higher knowledge of human abilities.”

original: gal te khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan na /
analyzed: gal te khyod kyis mu stegs can rnams dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan na /
translated: “If you show a miracle contest of higher knowledge of human abilities to the tīrthikas,

original: mu stegs can rnams ni /
analyzed: mu stegs can rnams ni /
translated: the tīrthikas will say,

original: dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ni mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi /🔽'on kyang 'di'i nyan @73a *//
analyzed: dge sbyong go'u ta ma la ni mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul med kyi / 'on kyang 'di'i nyan @73a *//
translated: ‘The ascetic Gautama does not have a miracle contest of higher knowledge of human abilities.

original: thos dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
analyzed: thos dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba /
translated: However, his disciple, the monk Maudgalyāyana, who has such great magical power

original: 'di ltar mthu che ba zhig nged dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston to //🔽zhes smra bar 'gyur bas /
analyzed: 'di ltar mthu che ba zhig nged dang lhan cig mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston to //🔽zhes smra bar 'gyur bas /
translated: and such great might, will show a miracle contest of higher knowledge of human abilities to us.’🔽“Therefore, Maudgalyāyana, do not show a miracle contest of higher knowledge of human abilities to the tīrthikas.”

analyzed: khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de yang rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug go /

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: mu stegs can rnams thag stsal pa dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar bgyi ba dang / skye bo dam pa rnams glo ba rangs par bgyi bar gsol pa bdag lags te / de ni dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas /
translated: I request that the tīrthikas be defeated, that the gods and humans be delighted, and that the holy beings be satisfied.

translated: Seeing the great miracle,

analyzed: de dag gis padma shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa /
translated: they brought lotuses the size of chariot wheels with a thousand petals,

original: thams cad gser las byas pa /
analyzed: thams cad gser las byas pa /
translated: all made of gold,

original: rin po che'i chu ba dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te sa brtol nas byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das padma de'i snying po la bzhugs so //
analyzed: rin po che'i chu ba dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can khyer te sa brtol nas byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das padma de'i snying po la bzhugs so //
translated: with jeweled stems and vajra anthers, which they pulled out of the ground. The Blessed One sat on the heart of that lotus.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas @75a *//
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas @75a *//
translated: Then, to the right

original: g-yon du padma de 'dra ba gzhan rab tu mang po dag byung bar gyur te /
analyzed: g-yon du padma de 'dra ba gzhan rab tu mang po dag byung bar gyur te /
translated: To the left of them, many other lotuses appeared,

original: de dag re re la yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs par gyur to //
analyzed: de dag re re la yang sprul pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs par gyur to //
translated: and on each of them was a manifested buddha.

original: de dag gi g-yas g-yon du yang padma de 'dra ba gzhan dag byung bar gyur cig /🔽de dag la gzhan /
analyzed: de dag gi g-yas g-yon du yang padma de 'dra ba gzhan dag byung bar gyur cig / de dag la gzhan /
translated: To the right and left of them, other lotuses appeared,🔽and on each of them was another manifested buddha.

original: de dag la yang gzhan te /
analyzed: de dag la yang gzhan te /
translated: And on each of those lotuses, there were others,🔽and so on, all the way up to the Akaniṣṭha realm, where many manifested buddhas appeared.

original: de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas phal po che sprul to; ;de na sangs rgyas kha cig ni 'bar /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas phal po che sprul to; ;de na sangs rgyas kha cig ni 'bar /
translated: Some of the buddhas there were blazing,

original: kha cig ni gsal bar mdzad /🔽kha cig ni char 'bebs /
analyzed: kha cig ni gsal bar mdzad / kha cig ni char 'bebs /
translated: some were shining,🔽some were raining,

original: kha cig ni glog 'byin /
analyzed: kha cig ni glog 'byin /
translated: some were flashing lightning,

original: kha cig ni kun shes pa lung ston /🔽kha cig ni zhu ba zhu /🔽kha cig ni lan 'debs /
analyzed: kha cig ni kun shes pa lung ston / kha cig ni zhu ba zhu / kha cig ni lan 'debs /
translated: some were giving prophecies of omniscience,🔽some were asking questions,🔽some were answering,

original: kha cig ni 'chag pa mdzad /🔽kha cig ni gzhes /🔽kha cig ni bzhengs /🔽kha cig ni bzhugs /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'chag pa mdzad / kha cig ni gzhes / kha cig ni bzhengs / kha cig ni bzhugs /
translated: some were walking,🔽some were sitting,🔽some were standing,

original: kha cig ni gzims te /
analyzed: kha cig ni gzims te /
translated: some were lying down,🔽and some were in the womb.

original: ji ltar byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis kyang sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong ba de ltar yang byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: ji ltar byis pa gzhon nu rnams kyis kyang sgrib pa med par sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong ba de ltar yang byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: He blessed the assembly so that even the young children could see the Buddha’s body without obstruction.

original: cho 'phrul de mthong nas /
analyzed: cho 'phrul de mthong nas /
translated: Having witnessed this miracle,

original: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang / yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dang / nam mkha'i dkyil na lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing rgyun mi 'chad par phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang / yul sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa'i srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dang / nam mkha'i dkyil na lha 'bum phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po la mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing rgyun mi 'chad par phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: King Prasenajit of Kosala, together with his harem, princes, ministers, and court officials, as well as the many hundreds of thousands of living beings who had come from various lands, and the many hundreds of thousands of gods in the sky who were watching the Blessed One’s great miracle with unblinking eyes and continuously paying homage,

original: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang rnga dag rdung ngo //
analyzed: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyang rnga dag rdung ngo //
translated: the gods dwelling in the sky beat their drums.

original: gnas gnas na yang rnga bo che rnams @75b ni rdung /
analyzed: gnas gnas na yang rnga bo che rnams @75b ni rdung /
translated: In every place, the great drums were beaten.

original: dung sgril ma ni 'bud /
analyzed: dung sgril ma ni 'bud /
translated: Conch shells were blown.

original: rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'byin cing /
analyzed: rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ni 'byin cing /
translated: Various musical instruments were played.

original: la la ni glu len /
analyzed: la la ni glu len /
translated: Some sang songs.

original: la la ni gar byed do //
analyzed: la la ni gar byed do //
translated: Some were dancing.

original: byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyang yid bde ba skyes nas /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i srog chags rnams kyang yid bde ba skyes nas /
translated: The animals, too, were filled with joy.

original: rang gi rigs dang 'dra ba'i sgra skad rnam pa sna tshogs sgrogs pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rang gi rigs dang 'dra ba'i sgra skad rnam pa sna tshogs sgrogs pa 'di lta ste /
translated: They let out various cries and sounds that were like those of their own species.

original: rta rnams ni 'tsher /🔽glang po che rnams ni ngur /
analyzed: rta rnams ni 'tsher / glang po che rnams ni ngur /
translated: The horses neighed,🔽the elephants trumpeted,

original: rnga mo rnams ni 'khong /
analyzed: rnga mo rnams ni 'khong /
translated: the camels grunted,

original: ba lang rnams ni 'bod /
analyzed: ba lang rnams ni 'bod /
translated: the oxen bellowed,

original: rma bya rnams ni 'gyur te /
analyzed: rma bya rnams ni 'gyur te /
translated: and the peacocks danced.

original: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skyes nas /
analyzed: lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba skyes nas /
translated: The entire world of gods and humans was filled with joy and delight.

original: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya bar spor bar gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya bar spor bar gyur to //
translated: They were inspired to make offerings to the Blessed One.

original: de nas lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu dang / padma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams gtor to //
analyzed: de nas lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog autpa la dang / padma dang / ku mu dang / padma dkar po dang / man da ra ba rnams gtor to //
translated: The gods then scattered divine utpala, padma, kumuda, puṇḍarīka, and mandārava flowers.

original: lha'i aa ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsandan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dag kyang gtor te /
analyzed: lha'i aa ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / tsandan gyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi gos dag kyang gtor te /
translated: They also scattered divine powdered sandalwood, agarwood, and saffron, as well as divine garments.

original: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang de bzhin no //
analyzed: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dag kyang de bzhin no //
translated: The same is true of the relationship between humans and non-humans.

original: de lta bu'i dga' ston chen po byung ba na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i dga' ston chen po byung ba na /
translated: When such a great festival occurred,

original: gdul ba'i skye bos rtogs par mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gdul ba'i skye bos rtogs par mdzad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to make it known to the disciples who were to be tamed,

original: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
translated: the Blessed One himself spoke these verses:

original: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
analyzed: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
translated: One should undertake and emerge,

original: sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya /
translated: Strive in the Buddha's teachings.

original: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
analyzed: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
translated: Like an elephant in a house of reeds,

original: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //🔽gang zhig chos 'dul 'di la ni //
analyzed: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya // gang zhig chos 'dul 'di la ni //
translated: One should conquer the army of the Lord of Death.🔽Whoever practices with care

original: bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa //
analyzed: bag dang ldan par spyod byed pa //
translated: In this Dharma and Vinaya,

original: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
analyzed: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
translated: Having abandoned the cycle of birth,

original: sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur //🔽lhag ma sprul pa'i @76a *//
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur // lhag ma sprul pa'i @76a *//
translated: Will reach the end of suffering.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /
translated: The remaining emanation buddhas

original: gcig car du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
analyzed: gcig car du tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
translated: Also spoke these verses simultaneously:

original: ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba //
analyzed: ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba //
translated: As long as the sun has not risen,

original: de srid srin bu me khyer gsal //
analyzed: de srid srin bu me khyer gsal //
translated: Fireflies shine brightly.

original: mkha' la nyi ma shar ba na //
analyzed: mkha' la nyi ma shar ba na //
translated: When the sun rises in the sky,

original: mog mog por 'gyur gsal mi 'gyur //
analyzed: mog mog por 'gyur gsal mi 'gyur //
translated: It becomes indistinct, not clear.

original: ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma byung //
analyzed: ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma byung //
translated: As long as the Tathāgata has not arisen,

original: rtog ge can rnams sngon gsal te //
analyzed: rtog ge can rnams sngon gsal te //
translated: the logicians are clear first,

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten snang //
translated: but when the perfect Buddha illuminates the world,

original: rtog ge mi gsal de slob min //
analyzed: rtog ge mi gsal de slob min //
translated: the logicians are not clear, they are not his disciples.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the monks:

original: dge slong dag cho 'phrul chen po mi snang bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dge slong dag cho 'phrul chen po mi snang bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: “Monks, the great miracle will disappear.

original: mtshan ma zung zhig /
analyzed: mtshan ma zung zhig /
translated: Take note of it!”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs ma thag tu mod la mi snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs ma thag tu mod la mi snang bar gyur to //
translated: As soon as the Blessed One had spoken, it immediately disappeared.

original: de mi snang bar gyur pa dang / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de mi snang bar gyur pa dang / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: When it disappeared, King Prasenajit of Kosala said to the tīrthikas:

original: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /
analyzed: kye bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul bstan zin te /
translated: “Hey, the Blessed One has shown the miracle of superhuman abilities, the highest human quality.

original: da ni khyed kyi res la bab pas khyed kyis ston cig /
analyzed: da ni khyed kyi res la bab pas khyed kyis ston cig /
translated: Now it is your turn. You should show it.”

original: de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed cang mi smra bar kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la gru phug byas so //
analyzed: de nas 'od srung rdzogs byed cang mi smra bar kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la gru phug byas so //
translated: Then Pūraṇa Kāśyapa remained silent, and the wandering mendicant Maskarin Gośālīputra was made the leader.

original: des kyang smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la'o //🔽des kyang mi pham skra'i la ba can la'o //
analyzed: des kyang smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la'o // des kyang mi pham skra'i la ba can la'o //
translated: He in turn made Saṃjayin Vairaṭīputra the leader.🔽He in turn made Ajita Keśakambala the leader.

original: des kyang ka tya'i bu nog can la'o //
analyzed: des kyang ka tya'i bu nog can la'o //
translated: He in turn made Kakuda Kātyāyana the leader.

original: des kyang gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la'o //
analyzed: des kyang gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu la'o //
translated: He in turn made Jñātiputra the Nigaṃṭha the leader.

original: des kyang 'od srung rdzogs byed la byas na /
analyzed: des kyang 'od srung rdzogs byed la byas na /
translated: He in turn made Pūraṇa Kāśyapa the leader.

original: 'ga' yang smra bar mi byed do //
analyzed: 'ga' yang smra bar mi byed do //
translated: But no one would speak.

original: de dag la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal pos de skad ces smras @76b na; de bzhin du gcig la gcig gru phug byed cing /
analyzed: de dag la lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du rgyal pos de skad ces smras @76b na; de bzhin du gcig la gcig gru phug byed cing /
translated: When the king said this to them a second and a third time, they remained silent, each making the other the leader.

original: cang mi zer bar gyur /🔽yul yul por gyur /🔽zhum zhum por gyur nas /
analyzed: cang mi zer bar gyur / yul yul por gyur / zhum zhum por gyur nas /
translated: They became silent,🔽became despondent,🔽became dejected,

original: mgo smad cing spobs pa med de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
analyzed: mgo smad cing spobs pa med de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
translated: hung their heads, lost their confidence, and sat there with their shoulders slumped.

original: de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'di snyam du /
analyzed: de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'di snyam du /
translated: Then the yakṣa Vajrapāṇi thought this:

original: skyes bu blun po 'di rnams yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la mtho 'tshams pas /
analyzed: skyes bu blun po 'di rnams yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das la mtho 'tshams pas /
translated: These foolish people have been harassing the Lord for a long time.

original: de'i phyir gang gis na 'di rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur ba'i thabs shig bya'o snyam nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang gis na 'di rnams kun tu 'bros par 'gyur ba'i thabs shig bya'o snyam nas /
translated: Therefore, I will do something so that they will all flee.

original: des gang gis na cho 'phrul gyi 'dun khang de /
analyzed: des gang gis na cho 'phrul gyi 'dun khang de /
translated: He sent forth a violent wind and rain so that the hall of miracles🔽would not even be visible to them.

original: de rnams kyi mig lam du yang mi 'bab pa de lta bu'i rlung dmar dang / char drag btang ba dang / de na kha cig ni bred nas ri'i gseb tu zhugs /🔽kha cig ni rtsva tshang tshing du /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mig lam du yang mi 'bab pa de lta bu'i rlung dmar dang / char drag btang ba dang / de na kha cig ni bred nas ri'i gseb tu zhugs / kha cig ni rtsva tshang tshing du /
translated: Some of them, frightened, went into the mountains,🔽some into the thickets,

original: kha cig ni nags thibs por /
analyzed: kha cig ni nags thibs por /
translated: some into the deep forests,

original: kha cig ni 'dun khang du /
analyzed: kha cig ni 'dun khang du /
translated: some into the hall,

original: kha cig ni lha khang du zhugs so //
analyzed: kha cig ni lha khang du zhugs so //
translated: and some into the temple.

original: bcom ldan 'das ni nyid kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang na bzhugs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni nyid kyi cho 'phrul chen po'i 'dun khang na bzhugs te /
translated: The Lord remained in the hall of his great miracle

original: tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /
translated: and spoke these verses:

original: 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni //
analyzed: 'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni //
translated: Those who are frightened by fear

original: phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang // kun dga' ra ba ljon shing dang // mchod rten rnams la skyabs su 'gro //🔽skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing //
analyzed: phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang // kun dga' ra ba ljon shing dang // mchod rten rnams la skyabs su 'gro // skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing //
translated: Most of them go for refuge to mountains, forests, parks, trees, and shrines.🔽That refuge is not the best,

original: skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin te //
analyzed: skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin te //
translated: that refuge is not supreme.

original: skyabs de dag la brten nas ni //
analyzed: skyabs de dag la brten nas ni //
translated: Relying on those refuges,

original: sdug bsngal kun las rab mi thar //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun las rab mi thar //
translated: one is not freed from all suffering.

original: gang zhig gang tshe sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun skya bas song zhing //
analyzed: gang zhig gang tshe sangs rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun skya bas song zhing //
translated: But when someone goes for refuge to the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha,

original: 'phags pa yi ni bden pa bzhi //
analyzed: 'phags pa yi ni bden pa bzhi //
translated: and to the four noble truths🔽—suffering, the origin of suffering,

original: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang // mya ngan @77a *//🔽'das pa bder 'gro ba'i //
analyzed: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang // sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang // mya ngan @77a *// 'das pa bder 'gro ba'i //
translated: the transcendence of suffering,

original: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dag /
analyzed: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po dag /
translated: and the noble eightfold path that leads to the bliss of nirvāṇa—

original: shes rab kyis ni lta byed na //🔽skyabs de dag ni gtso yin zhing //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni lta byed na // skyabs de dag ni gtso yin zhing //
translated: and sees them with wisdom,🔽that refuge is the best,

original: skyabs de dag ni mchog yin te //
analyzed: skyabs de dag ni mchog yin te //
translated: that refuge is supreme.

original: skyabs de dag la brten nas ni //
analyzed: skyabs de dag la brten nas ni //
translated: Relying on those refuges,

original: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thar //
translated: one is freed from all suffering.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de la brten te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas de la brten te /
translated: Then the Blessed One, knowing the thoughts, habitual tendencies, temperament, and nature of the assembly, taught them the Dharma accordingly.

original: gang thos na sems can brgya phrag mang pos khyad par chen po thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pas /🔽kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
analyzed: gang thos na sems can brgya phrag mang pos khyad par chen po thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pas / kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
translated: When they heard it, many hundreds of beings attained great distinction.🔽Some manifested the fruit of stream entry.

original: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /
translated: Some manifested the fruit of once-returning.

original: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu /🔽kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu / kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te /
translated: Some manifested the fruit of non-returning.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
translated: Some abandoned all afflictions and manifested arhatship.

original: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
translated: Some generated the intention to achieve the enlightenment of a hearer.

original: kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu /
translated: Some generated the intention to achieve the enlightenment of a solitary buddha.

original: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
analyzed: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de /
translated: Some generated the intention to achieve unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par bkod do //
analyzed: 'khor de phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par bkod do //
translated: He established the majority of the assembly in the Buddha, in the Dharma, and in the Saṅgha.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /🔽yang dag par len du bcug /🔽yang dag par gzengs bstod /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan / yang dag par len du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
translated: Then the Blessed One, with a talk on the Dharma, instructed,🔽inspired,🔽and delighted

original: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de /
analyzed: yang dag par dga' bar mdzad de /
translated: the assembly.

original: ri bor gang po'i mtshan de na sna la gtogs pa gang po zhes bya ba de tshol to //🔽gal te rnyed dang / de'i chung ma la bu yod dam /
analyzed: ri bor gang po'i mtshan de na sna la gtogs pa gang po zhes bya ba de tshol to // gal te rnyed dang / de'i chung ma la bu yod dam /
translated: Search for the one named Pūrṇa in the village of Pūrṇagrāma.

original: med rtogs shig ces bsgo'o //
analyzed: med rtogs shig ces bsgo'o //
translated: If you find him, find out if his wife is pregnant or not.

original: de dag song ste mthong nas dris na /🔽des bdag gi chung ma la bu yod do zhes smras pa dang / de dag slar 'ongs nas rgyal po la gsol pa /
analyzed: de dag song ste mthong nas dris na / des bdag gi chung ma la bu yod do zhes smras pa dang / de dag slar 'ongs nas rgyal po la gsol pa /
translated: They went and saw him and asked, Is your wife pregnant?

original: rgyal po sna la gtogs pa de mchis te /
analyzed: rgyal po sna la gtogs pa de mchis te /
translated: He said, Yes, my wife is pregnant, and they returned and reported to the king, The one named Pūrṇa is here.

original: de'i mchis brang yang sbrum lags so //
analyzed: de'i mchis brang yang sbrum lags so //
translated: His wife is also pregnant.

original: de nas rgyal pos yi ge spring ste /🔽gang po bkug nas bshes pa'i tshig gis /
analyzed: de nas rgyal pos yi ge spring ste / gang po bkug nas bshes pa'i tshig gis /
translated: Then the king sent a letter, saying, Summon Pūrṇa.

original: de la ri bor de byin nas 'dis rang gi bu ma'i lto na 'dug pa de deng phyin chad yongs su skyongs la /
analyzed: de la ri bor de byin nas 'dis rang gi bu ma'i lto na 'dug pa de deng phyin chad yongs su skyongs la /
translated: With words of friendship, give him that village and say, 'From now on, you must take care of the child in your wife's womb.

original: ci nas kyang de yan lag gang yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
analyzed: ci nas kyang de yan lag gang yang nyams par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
translated: Do it in such a way that none of its limbs are impaired.'

original: ces bsgo'o // de @87b nas de zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
analyzed: ces bsgo'o // de @87b nas de zla ba dgu tshang ba dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
translated: So he was named Great Medicine.

original: mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas /🔽ci 'byor pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
analyzed: mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas nas / ci 'byor pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas te /
translated: After nine months had passed, a son was born who was well proportioned, pleasing to the eye, and beautiful.

original: khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes byas na /🔽de'i mas smras pa /
analyzed: khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes byas na / de'i mas smras pa /
translated: A great celebration was held for the birth, and it was asked, What name should we give this child?

original: bdag 'di lta yun ring du nad bu can du gyur te /
analyzed: bdag 'di lta yun ring du nad bu can du gyur te /
translated: His mother said, For a long time I was sick.

original: sman pa dang / sman dang / nad g-yog rnams kyis nad zhi bar bya ma nus pa las /
analyzed: sman pa dang / sman dang / nad g-yog rnams kyis nad zhi bar bya ma nus pa las /
translated: Doctors, medicine, and nurses were unable to cure my illness.

original: gang gi tshe khye'u 'di ltor zhugs pa de nyid nas nad zhi bar gyur pas /
analyzed: gang gi tshe khye'u 'di ltor zhugs pa de nyid nas nad zhi bar gyur pas /
translated: But when this child entered my womb, my illness was cured.

original: des na 'di'i ming sman chen por gdags so //
analyzed: des na 'di'i ming sman chen por gdags so //
translated: Therefore, his name will be Great Medicine.

original: smras pa / sman rnams kun gyi nang na ni //
analyzed: smras pa / sman rnams kun gyi nang na ni //
translated: He said, Among all medicines,

original: bdag gi bu ni sman chen po //
analyzed: bdag gi bu ni sman chen po //
translated: my son is the great medicine.

original: 'di ni sman pas lhag pa'i sman /
analyzed: 'di ni sman pas lhag pa'i sman /
translated: This is a medicine that surpasses doctors.

original: de ltas 'di'i ming sman yin no //
analyzed: de ltas 'di'i ming sman yin no //
translated: Therefore, his name is Medicine.

original: de nas sman chen po pha'i phrag pa la zhon te /
analyzed: de nas sman chen po pha'i phrag pa la zhon te /
translated: Then Great Medicine rode on his father's shoulders

original: khrus bya ba'i phyir srang gi dbus nas rdzing bur khyer te song ba las /
analyzed: khrus bya ba'i phyir srang gi dbus nas rdzing bur khyer te song ba las /
translated: In order to bathe, they took him to a pond in the middle of the street.

original: re zhig na sa'i steng na nya'i dum bu zhig 'dug pa mthong nas /
analyzed: re zhig na sa'i steng na nya'i dum bu zhig 'dug pa mthong nas /
translated: After a while, he saw a piece of fish on the ground.

original: des de la rin po che yin no snyam nas /
analyzed: des de la rin po che yin no snyam nas /
translated: He thought, “This is a jewel.”

original: de'i rkang pa'i mthe bos sa steng nas blang bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na sman chen pos smras pa /
analyzed: de'i rkang pa'i mthe bos sa steng nas blang bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na sman chen pos smras pa /
translated: He began to pick it up with his toe, but at that moment Mahāmaudgalyāyana said,

original: pha gcig gang po rin chen lhung snyam ste //
analyzed: pha gcig gang po rin chen lhung snyam ste //
translated: “Father, Pūrṇa, thinking it is a jewel,

original: las btang mig mi 'dzum par nya dum la //
analyzed: las btang mig mi 'dzum par nya dum la //
translated: you look at the piece of fish with unblinking eyes

original: rtog cing de nas rin chen yin par sems //
analyzed: rtog cing de nas rin chen yin par sems //
translated: and imagine it is a jewel.

original: pha gcig gang po rtogs shig rin chen min //
analyzed: pha gcig gang po rtogs shig rin chen min //
translated: “Father, Pūrṇa, it is not a jewel.

original: nya dum dmar po rkang gis 'dril bar zad //
analyzed: nya dum dmar po rkang gis 'dril bar zad //
translated: It is just a red piece of fish rolled up with its feet.

original: rnam thos bu de bag med spyod ma yin //🔽de nas de rdzing du song nas gang pos sman chen po dang / gos rdzing 'gram du bzhag ste /
analyzed: rnam thos bu de bag med spyod ma yin // de nas de rdzing du song nas gang pos sman chen po dang / gos rdzing 'gram du bzhag ste /
translated: Vaiśravaṇa is not one who acts carelessly.”🔽Then they went to the pond. Pūrṇa put Mahāmaudgalyāyana’s clothes on the bank of the pond

original: khrus bya ba'i phyir chur zhugs pa na /
analyzed: khrus bya ba'i phyir chur zhugs pa na /
translated: and entered the water to bathe.

original: padma'i steng na chu skyar zhig 'dug pa dang / des @88a *//
analyzed: padma'i steng na chu skyar zhig 'dug pa dang / des @88a *//
translated: On the lotus sat a water bird.

original: chu skyar de bzung ngo snyam nas de de'i drung du song ba dang / de yang de nas 'phur to //
analyzed: chu skyar de bzung ngo snyam nas de de'i drung du song ba dang / de yang de nas 'phur to //
translated: He thought, I will catch that water bird, and he went to where it was, but it flew away.

original: de nas sman chen pos smras pa /
analyzed: de nas sman chen pos smras pa /
translated: Then Mahāmaudgalyāyana said:

original: padma'i steng nas chu skyar 'phur //🔽chu skyar 'phur bas padma lhags //🔽padma'i steng nas chu skyar mo //
analyzed: padma'i steng nas chu skyar 'phur // chu skyar 'phur bas padma lhags // padma'i steng nas chu skyar mo //
translated: The water bird flew from the lotus.🔽The lotus was left behind by the flying water bird.🔽The water bird on the lotus

original: 'phur ba re zhig pha gcig gzigs //
analyzed: 'phur ba re zhig pha gcig gzigs //
translated: flew away, leaving the lotus behind.

original: de nas yang dus phyi zhig na /
analyzed: de nas yang dus phyi zhig na /
translated: Then, at another time,

original: des sman chen po phrag pa la khyer nas chu bo gangg'ar khrus byed du song ste /
analyzed: des sman chen po phrag pa la khyer nas chu bo gangg'ar khrus byed du song ste /
translated: he carried Mahāmaudgalyāyana on his shoulders and went to the Ganges River to bathe.

original: des de dang gos chu 'gram du bzhag nas chur zhugs te /
analyzed: des de dang gos chu 'gram du bzhag nas chur zhugs te /
translated: He left him and his clothes on the bank of the river and entered the water.

original: khrus byed pa na /
analyzed: khrus byed pa na /
translated: While bathing,

original: khar gzhong zhig chu bos khyer ba de'i steng na ngang mo zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: khar gzhong zhig chu bos khyer ba de'i steng na ngang mo zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //
translated: he saw a female duck sitting on a basin that was being carried away by the river.

original: de mthong nas sman chen pos smras pa /
analyzed: de mthong nas sman chen pos smras pa /
translated: Seeing that, Mahāmaudgalyāyana said:

original: chu bo gangg'as khar gzhong khyer //
analyzed: chu bo gangg'as khar gzhong khyer //
translated: The Ganges River is carrying away a basin.

original: khar gzhong de steng ngang mo 'dug /
analyzed: khar gzhong de steng ngang mo 'dug /
translated: On that basin sits a female duck.

original: khar gzhong ngang mo lhan cig tu //
analyzed: khar gzhong ngang mo lhan cig tu //
translated: The duck and the platter were carried off together.

original: gangg'as khyer ba pha gcig gzigs //
analyzed: gangg'as khyer ba pha gcig gzigs //
translated: The father saw them being carried off by the Ganges.

original: ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed cing /
analyzed: ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed cing /
translated: After some time, the father went to bathe in the Ganges.

original: sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag pa dang / re zhig na chu bo gangg'a'i rgyun phyogs su bum pa zhig khyer ba de'i steng na /
analyzed: sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag pa dang / re zhig na chu bo gangg'a'i rgyun phyogs su bum pa zhig khyer ba de'i steng na /
translated: He left Mahāmaudgalyāyana on the bank of the river, and a pot that was being carried by the current of the Ganges came by.🔽On top of it was a water fowl.

original: chu sreg zhig 'dug pa de mthong nas; sman chen pos pha la smras pa /
analyzed: chu sreg zhig 'dug pa de mthong nas; sman chen pos pha la smras pa /
translated: Mahāmaudgalyāyana saw it and said to his father,

original: chu bo gangg'as bum pa khyer //
analyzed: chu bo gangg'as bum pa khyer //
translated: “The Ganges is carrying off a pot,

original: de yi steng na chu sreg 'dug /
analyzed: de yi steng na chu sreg 'dug /
translated: on top of which is a water fowl.

original: re zhig pha gcig bum pa ni //
analyzed: re zhig pha gcig bum pa ni //
translated: The father and son together saw

original: chu sreg gangg'a bcas te gzigs //
analyzed: chu sreg gangg'a bcas te gzigs //
translated: the Ganges carrying off the pot and the water fowl.

original: ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed par 'dod nas /🔽chu bo gangg'ar song ste /
analyzed: ji tsam du dus gzhan zhig na yang khrus byed par 'dod nas / chu bo gangg'ar song ste /
translated: After some time, he again wanted to bathe,🔽so he went to the Ganges.

original: des sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag nas /
analyzed: des sman chen po chu 'gram du bzhag nas /
translated: He left Mahāmaudgalyāyana on the bank of the river,🔽and he went into the water.

original: der khrus byed pa la zhugs pa dang / re zhig na chu bo gangg'a'i rgyun phyogs @88b su lug thug cig khyer ba de'i steng na bya dkar zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: der khrus byed pa la zhugs pa dang / re zhig na chu bo gangg'a'i rgyun phyogs @88b su lug thug cig khyer ba de'i steng na bya dkar zhig 'dug pa mthong ngo //
translated: He entered the water to bathe and saw a white bird sitting on a sheep and a goat that were being carried along by the current of the Ganges.

original: de nas de sman chen pos mthong nas smras pa /
analyzed: de nas de sman chen pos mthong nas smras pa /
translated: Then Mahāmaudgalyāyana saw it and said:

original: chu bo gangg'as lug thug khyer //
analyzed: chu bo gangg'as lug thug khyer //
translated: “The Ganges is carrying away a sheep and a goat.

original: de bzhin de steng bya dkar 'dug /🔽lug thug bya dkar lhan cig tu //
analyzed: de bzhin de steng bya dkar 'dug / lug thug bya dkar lhan cig tu //
translated: A white bird is sitting on top of them.🔽Father, look!

original: gangg'as khyer ba yab gcig gzigs //
analyzed: gangg'as khyer ba yab gcig gzigs //
translated: The Ganges is carrying away a sheep, a goat, and a white bird.”🔽Then Mahāmaudgalyāyana was playing with the children.

original: de nas sman chen po de na byis pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba las re zhig na /🔽byis pa de dag 'dus nas /
analyzed: de nas sman chen po de na byis pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba las re zhig na / byis pa de dag 'dus nas /
translated: After a while,

original: da rgyal por bcug go ;des kyang kha cig blon por bcug nas /
analyzed: da rgyal por bcug go ;des kyang kha cig blon por bcug nas /
translated: “Now we’ll make him king.” He made some of them ministers.

original: de de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug go /
analyzed: de de dag dang lhan cig rtse zhing 'dug go /
translated: He sat there playing with them.

original: ji tsam na bram ze rgan po zhig chung ma gzhon nu dar la bab pa zhig dang / khyo shug lhan cig tu lam du zhugs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba las /
analyzed: ji tsam na bram ze rgan po zhig chung ma gzhon nu dar la bab pa zhig dang / khyo shug lhan cig tu lam du zhugs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba las /
translated: Then an old brahman and his young wife, a couple, were traveling together on the road to another country.

original: re zhig na bram ze bshang gci'i sar song ngo //
analyzed: re zhig na bram ze bshang gci'i sar song ngo //
translated: After a while, the brahman went to the place where the excrement was.

original: de nas g-yon can pho zhig gis 'phrigs nas /
analyzed: de nas g-yon can pho zhig gis 'phrigs nas /
translated: Then a certain rogue, having noticed this,

original: bud med de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
analyzed: bud med de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
translated: went to the woman and said,

original: bzang mo khyod kyi pha de gar song /
analyzed: bzang mo khyod kyi pha de gar song /
translated: “Good woman, where did your father go?”

original: bud med kyis smras pa /
analyzed: bud med kyis smras pa /
translated: The woman said,🔽“What?”

original: gang zhig / de nas g-yon can gyis smras pa /
analyzed: gang zhig / de nas g-yon can gyis smras pa /
translated: Then the rogue said,

original: des mes po yin pa lta zhig /
analyzed: des mes po yin pa lta zhig /
translated: “He is your grandfather, isn’t he?”

original: smras pa / 'di ci zer ba zhig /
analyzed: smras pa / 'di ci zer ba zhig /
translated: She said, “What are you saying?”

original: de nas g-yon can gyis smras pa /
analyzed: de nas g-yon can gyis smras pa /
translated: Then the rogue said,

original: de khyod kyi mes po yin pa lta zhig /
analyzed: de khyod kyi mes po yin pa lta zhig /
translated: “He is your grandfather, isn’t he?”
